faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.a1: Prop trading (proprietary trading) allows you to trade with a trading company's capital. You first pass a challenge to prove your skills, then you receive a funded account and keep up to 80% of the profits.
faqSection.q2: How does the TradeSense challenge work?
faqSection.a2: Choose a plan (Starter, Pro or Elite), reach the profit target (8-10%) without exceeding the loss limits. Once passed, you receive a funded account with the same capital.
faqSection.a3: You can trade US stocks (Apple, Tesla, Google...), cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum...) and Moroccan stocks (IAM, Attijariwafa Bank...).
faqSection.a4: Our AI analyzes real-time market data, technical indicators and sentiment to generate buy/sell signals with a confidence level. You also receive risk alerts.
faqSection.a5: Yes! Once your challenge is passed and your account is funded, you can withdraw your profits every month. You keep up to 80% of your gains.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our challenges
faq.a1: You receive a virtual account with the initial balance. Your goal is to reach 10% profit without exceeding daily loss (5%) or total loss (10%) limits. Once passed, you receive a funded account!
faq.a2: Yes! We use real-time data from US markets (via Yahoo Finance), cryptocurrencies, and the Casablanca Stock Exchange. You trade in real conditions.
faq.q3: What happens if I pass the challenge?
faq.a3: Congratulations! You will be contacted by our team to discuss next steps. You will receive a funded account with the same capital and keep up to 80% of your profits.
faq.a4: Yes, cryptocurrencies are available 24/7. US markets follow NYSE/NASDAQ hours (9:30am-4pm EST).
faq.q5: Is there a time limit for the challenge?
faq.a5: No! There is no time limit. Take the time you need to reach your goals calmly and strategically.
faq.a6: Our Gemini AI analyzes market data, technical indicators, sentiment and news to generate buy/sell signals with a confidence level.

items.q: How does the trading AI work?
items.a: Our AI uses Deep Learning and Machine Learning algorithms to analyze millions of data points in real-time. It detects patterns invisible to the human eye and generates trading signals with up to 96% accuracy.

items.q: What is the difference between AI levels?
items.a: Each level offers more sophisticated algorithms. AI Starter uses basic technical analysis, while AI Elite combines Deep Learning, sentiment analysis and institutional data for ultra-precise predictions.
No signal is 100% guaranteed. However, our AI Elite shows a 96% success rate over the last 12 months. Trading always involves risks.
Yes! You can upgrade your plan at any time to access a more powerful AI. The price difference will be calculated pro-rata.

about.title: Empowering Traders to Achieve Their
about.subtitle: We believe talented traders shouldn't be held back by lack of capital. Our mission is to identify, fund, and support skilled traders worldwide.

story.title: From Vision to
story.p1: TradeSense was born from a simple observation: many talented traders around the world lack the capital to trade professionally. We set out to change that.
story.p2: Founded by a team of experienced traders and fintech professionals, we built a platform that gives skilled traders access to significant trading capital without risking their own money.
story.p3: Today, we've funded hundreds of traders from over 50 countries, paying out millions in profits. But we're just getting started.

howItWorks.subtitle: Follow our simple 4-step process to prove your trading skills and get access to real capital. No hidden fees, no tricks - just pure trading.

q1.question: What is TradeSense?
q1.answer: TradeSense is a proprietary trading firm that funds talented traders. We provide capital to traders who prove their skills through our evaluation process, allowing them to trade without risking their own money and keep up to 80% of the profits they generate.

q2.question: How does the challenge process work?
q2.answer: Our challenge has two phases: Phase 1 (Evaluation) requires you to reach a 10% profit target, and Phase 2 (Verification) requires a 5% profit target. Once you pass both phases, you become a funded trader with access to real capital.

q3.question: Is there a free trial available?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial with $5,000 virtual capital. This allows you to experience our platform and trading conditions before committing to a paid challenge. The trial has a 10% profit target and includes access to all platform features.

q4.question: What are the profit targets for each phase?
q4.answer: Phase 1 (Evaluation) has a 10% profit target, and Phase 2 (Verification) has a 5% profit target. There is no time limit to achieve these targets, so you can trade at your own pace.

q5.question: What are the maximum drawdown rules?
q5.answer: We have two drawdown rules: a 10% maximum overall drawdown (from your starting balance) and a 5% maximum daily loss limit. If you breach either rule, your challenge ends and you would need to start over.

q6.question: Is there a time limit to complete the challenge?
q6.answer: No, there is no time limit to complete either phase of the challenge. You can take as long as you need to reach the profit targets while respecting the risk management rules.

q7.question: Can I trade during news events?
q7.answer: Yes, you can trade during high-impact news events. However, we recommend proper risk management during volatile periods. There are no trading restrictions on news events.

q8.question: How much do the challenges cost?
q8.answer: Our challenge prices vary by account size: Starter ($5K account) costs $200, Pro ($25K account) costs $500, and Elite ($100K account) costs $1,000. These are one-time fees with no recurring charges.

q9.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q9.answer: We accept PayPal, credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and various local payment methods depending on your region. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.

q10.question: How do I receive my profits as a funded trader?
q10.answer: As a funded trader, you can request a payout once you have profits available. Payouts are processed within 24 hours and sent via your preferred method (bank transfer, PayPal, or crypto). You keep up to 80% of your profits.

q11.question: Is there a minimum payout amount?
q11.answer: Yes, the minimum payout amount is $100. You can request payouts on a monthly basis, and there are no limits on the maximum payout amount.

q12.question: What markets can I trade?
q12.answer: You can trade US stocks, cryptocurrencies, and Moroccan stocks on our platform. We provide real-time market data and competitive spreads across all instruments.

q13.question: What trading platform do you use?
q13.answer: We provide our own proprietary trading platform with real-time charts, AI-powered signals, and advanced order management. The platform is web-based and accessible from any device.

q14.question: Are there any trading restrictions?
q14.answer: We have minimal restrictions: no martingale strategies, no copy trading from external sources, and positions must be closed before the market closes on Friday (for weekend risk management). Other than that, you have full freedom in your trading approach.

q15.question: What is the maximum leverage available?
q15.answer: Leverage varies by instrument: up to 1:100 for forex, 1:20 for stocks, and 1:10 for cryptocurrencies. We recommend using appropriate leverage based on your risk management strategy.

q16.question: Can I have multiple challenge accounts?
q16.answer: Yes, you can have multiple challenge accounts. However, you cannot use the same trading strategy across multiple accounts (no copy trading between your own accounts).

q17.question: What happens if I fail the challenge?
q17.answer: If you breach a rule or fail to reach the profit target, your challenge ends. You can purchase a new challenge at any time to try again. We recommend reviewing your trades and refining your strategy before retrying.

q18.question: Can I scale my funded account?
q18.answer: Yes! Our scaling program allows you to increase your account size based on consistent performance. After maintaining profitability for 3 months, you can request an account size increase up to $300K.
